episodes.title: Waco : The Inside Story
episodes.description: Investigates the siege of the Branch Davidian compound in Waco, Texas in April 1993, and the hostile interplay between FBI tactics teams and hostage negotiators.1 videocassette (57 min.) : 1/2 inGeneralVHSDirector of photography, Ben McCoy; reporters, Scott Malone, Joe Rosenbloom III; correspondent, Peter J. Boyer"A coproduction of the Kirk Documentary Group, for Frontline."Originally broadcast October 17, 1995 as a segment of: FrontlineScott Malone, Joe Rosenbloom III

episodes.title: Jonestown The Life And Death Of Peoples Temple
Jonestown: The Life and Death of Peoples Temple
episodes.description: Featuring never-before-seen footage, this documentary delivers a startling new look at the Peoples Temple, headed by preacher Jim Jones who, in 1978, led more than 900 members to Guyana, where he orchestrated a mass suicide via tainted punch.
